name: dummy-blockstack-core
description: Our project depends on the Blockstack Core API. We have a local, development version of it, but we are having trouble configuring it properly so we can use it (in particular, we cannot find a user's public/private key pair). Until we get this working, we have set up this directory with a *super* simple server that mimics one of Blockstack's API calls, and serves dummy zonefiles for users.
